EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Invite - London
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Cloud Platform Seminar - London
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tuesday, November 17, 2015 Bentima House 168-172 Old Street London EC1V 9BP United Kingdom REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-platform-seminar> Join Pivotal and CenturyLink to learn how software is transforming the world. At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal's Cloud Foundry platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal Cloud Foundry. WHO SHOULD ATTEND The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all. Register <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-platform-seminar> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:10 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Keynote
10:00 AM - 10:15 AM Coffee Break
10:15 AM - 11:15 AM Customer Use Case
11:15 AM - 11:30 AM Coffee Break
11:30 AM - 12:30 PM Session: Lab 1
12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Networking Lunch
1:30 PM - 4:00 PM Session: Lab 2
4:00 PM Wrap Up VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-platform-seminar>
